  • Method Details

    • startSolve

      protected void startSolve(SearchStatistics statistics, Predicate<SearchStatistics> limit, Runnable onNodeVisit)
      Description copied from class: AbstractSearchMethod
      Start the solving process. This method must be implemented by subclasses and do the heavy work. It must call notifySolution/notifyFailure when a solution is found or a failure occurs.
      Specified by:
      startSolve in class AbstractSearchMethod<Runnable>
      Parameters:
      statistics -
      limit -
      onNodeVisit - a closure to execute at each node visit
